item.description:
We have a powerhouse meetup this month! We will have a discussion and book signing by Melanie Joy followed by the always delicious vegan buffet.

Melanie Joy will be giving a talk and doing a book signing for her new book on the psychology of meat, entitled “Why We Love Dogs, Eat Pigs, and Wear Cows: An Introduction to Carnism” from 10:30 until noon.

The fundraising all you can eat vegan buffet will start at the usual time of noon. It's only 10 bucks for all you can eat. 10% of the day's proceeds are donated to VegWorcester to support projects like our upcoming first annual 2010 Worcester VegFest!
item.name: Buddha Hut Monthly Vegan Buffet & Melanie Joy speaks about her new book!!!
